title: Wireless Network Penetration Test
description: A penetration tester is tasked with cracking the password for the corporate guest Wi-Fi network.

tasks.description: Use a wireless adapter to scan for all nearby Wi-Fi networks and identify the corporate guest network.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully identifies the target network's SSID and security type (WPA2).

tasks.description: Capture the WPA2 handshake from a legitimate user connecting to the network.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully captures the necessary handshake data.

tasks.description: Run an offline dictionary attack against the captured handshake to crack the password.
tasks.expected_outcome: Tester successfully cracks the weak, dictionary-based password, achieving the test's objective.
